ul.li: Install SilkPage on Wilma.
Creating the Team page.
Call for project name proposals.
Created a Delicious account for the project.
Added project XML feeds to the website.
Extended SilkPage stylesheets to provide support for RSS feeds when it generates a list of site feeds.
Register Salesmen on Google Code.
Create Salesmen group on Google Groups.
Design the structure of the SVN server.
Import website files to the Subversion repository.
Configure the SVN server and the issue tracker to post activity notifications to the project dev list.
Add other members to both the project and the group.
Searched on the web to find a suitable piece of software for generating timesheets.
Installed doProject with the TimeCard module but it wasn't quite what we needed.
Experimented with the live demos of a few other applications.
Improved the structure and content of the website.
Added RDF/XML metadata for website pages.
Added the project's DOAP file.
Added a URFM for publishing minutes.
Added minutes of the 2009/10/16 meeting.
